name: Chased by Darkness
storyline: A new inmate brought with him a bestial spirit. Two days after his arrival, there was a mass suicide attempt in the penitentiary, among those involved were prisoners and prison officers. The authorities did not want to believe the victims reports of a supernatural force, but decided to evacuate the penitentiary until everything was cleared up. The prison warden called you, a clairvoyant, to help. Now, you will need to perform a ritual to purify the penitentiary and free it from the presence of Barkannan.
summary: Chased by Darkness is a 1-4 players co-op survival horror. Your mission is to face supernatural entities and banish them to the spiritual plane. Explore, fight enemies and don't let the darkness reach you.
